completion.item:
Contstructs the dom for this tabitem
Returns: the created node

Set a new active state for this item
Parameters: (boolean) the - new active state

Returns the content control for this item
Returns: the control

Returns the tooltip text for this item
Returns: the tooltip text

Event handler for this item. Its main use is to pass through keyboard events to all listeners.
Parameters: (Event) e - DOMEvent

Sets content for this item that appears in the client area of the TabFolder when this item is activated. Use EITHER setContent OR setControl!
Parameters: (string) content - the content

Sets a control for that appears in the client area of the TabFolder when this item is activated
Parameters: (gara.jswt.Control) control - the control
Throws: TypeError - when that is not a gara.jswt.Control

Sets the ToolTip text for this item
Parameters: (string) text - the tooltip text
